exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros x y. split. - intros H. apply lb_ortho_iff in H; destruct H as [_ H]. apply lb_meet_eq in H. rewrite H. reflexivity. - intros H. apply lb_meet_eq_Proper. apply lb_ortho_iff_Proper. + apply lb_ortho_anti; auto. + split; auto. + apply lb_meet_left. + apply lb_meet_right.
